title: IS_ALPHANUMERIC_SPACE
description: Checks if every character in the provided string is either a letter, a digit, or a space.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: The text to evaluate for alphanumeric characters and spaces.

examples:
IS_ALPHANUMERIC_SPACE("Hello World!")
-- Returns FALSE, as it contains punctuation.

tips.text: Returns TRUE if the string is empty.
Any symbol included will cause the expression to return FALSE.
